Notes.Text:
This update for ghostscript fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-33871: Prevent OPVP device arbitrary code execution via custom Driver library. (bsc#1225491)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in Artifex Ghostscript before 10.03.1. contrib/opvp/gdevopvp.c allows arbitrary code execution via a custom Driver library, exploitable via a crafted PostScript document. This occurs because the Driver parameter for opvp (and oprp) devices can have an arbitrary name for a dynamic library; this library is then loaded.
